alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 11:56PM CDT until June 17 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Semmes, or 8 miles west of Saraland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Point Clear, Loxley, Chunchula, Stapleton, Axis, Silverhill, Tanner Williams and Semmes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
